subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: On the day Lance Armstrong had hoped to win a stage in his final Tour de France, he was just not good enough, losing a sprint finish to Pierrick Fedrigo of France.
snippet: On the day Lance Armstrong had hoped to win a stage in his final Tour de France, he was just not good enough, losing a sprint finish to Pierrick Fedrigo of France.
